data.name: Serious Fun Football
data.detailed_description:
Are you ready to experience something fresh in the football video games genre? Don't let the game's cartoonish graphics deceive you! Let us surprise you with realistic characters' movement, kicking and real ball physics.

Creating this game, we wanted to move to the screen all these emotions that accompany playing with your friends on a small field in real life - the freedom of movement, constant looking out for a free position, dynamic gameplay.

Play friendly matches online or local in front of one screen with your friends.
Play against AI in the league and gather the in-game coins. Use them to buy new team members in the Team Mode or boost up your own, designed by yourself, footballer in Solo Mode. You can also buy new outfits, unlock stadiums, and customize the appearance of your character!

OTHER GAME FEATURES:

  • ⚽️ 3 vs 3 gameplay plus robot goalkeepers.
  • ⚽️ Football pitch surrounded by the fence, no throw-ins, corners or offsides.
  • ⚽️ In Solo Mode you control just one footballer. In Team Mode you control whole team by switching between footballers.



This Steam Early Access game is currently not a finished game and may or may not change significantly over the course of development. To learn more about Steam Early Access, please visit http://store.steampowered.com/earlyaccessfaq/

data.short_description: Serious Fun Football is a football game with real ball physics and realistic feeling of movements and shooting. Control one specific player or whole team. Each footballer has an unique set of attributes. Gather your friends and play online or offline!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 955, Intel Core i5-750 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change. SOME BUSINESS LAPTOPS WITH INTEGRATED GRAPHIC CARD WERE ABLE TO RUN THIS GAME ON A VERY LOW GRAPHICS SETTINGS, AS WE IMPLEMENTED SPECIAL FEATURE WHICH RESCALES THE RESOLUTION. FEEL FREE TO CHECK IF YOU ACHIEVE STABLE 60 FPS ON LOW END MACHINES WHILE FREE DEMO IS AVAILABLE. 60 FPS IS NEEDED FOR SMOOTH GAMEPLAY AND IS MANDATORY FOR ONLINE GAME. PLEASE BE ADVICED THAT THE GAME, IN LOW OR VERY LOW GRAPHICS SETTINGS, DOESN'T REPRESENT FULL PRODUCT VALUE.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: AMD FX-6130 Six-Core, Intel Core i5-4440S 2.80GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is is still in development, minimum system requirements may change.
